tasks.title: Setup Project Infrastructure and Database Schema
tasks.description: Initialize project structure with Docker containers, PostgreSQL database, and FastAPI backend foundation
tasks.details: Create Docker compose setup with PostgreSQL container, initialize FastAPI project structure, implement database models for User, Receipt, LineItem, and Categories tables with proper relationships and indexing. Set up Alembic for database migrations and create initial migration scripts.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify database connection, test CRUD operations on all models, validate foreign key constraints and indexes performance

subtasks.title: Create Docker Compose Configuration
subtasks.description: Set up Docker Compose with PostgreSQL container and environment configuration
subtasks.details: Create docker-compose.yml file with PostgreSQL service, configure environment variables for database connection, set up volume mounts for persistent data storage, and define network configuration for service communication
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify containers start successfully and PostgreSQL is accessible on configured port

subtasks.title: Initialize FastAPI Project Structure
subtasks.description: Create FastAPI application foundation with proper project organization
subtasks.details: Initialize FastAPI project with main.py entry point, create directory structure (app/, models/, api/, core/), set up requirements.txt with FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, and PostgreSQL dependencies, configure CORS and basic middleware
subtasks.testStrategy: Test FastAPI server starts and responds to health check endpoint

subtasks.title: Implement Database Models
subtasks.description: Create SQLAlchemy models for User, Receipt, LineItem, and Categories with relationships
subtasks.details: Define User model with authentication fields, Receipt model with user relationship and metadata, LineItem model with receipt relationship and item details, Categories model with hierarchical structure, implement proper foreign key relationships and database indexes for performance
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate model relationships and constraints work correctly in test database

subtasks.title: Configure Alembic for Database Migrations
subtasks.description: Set up Alembic migration system with proper configuration
subtasks.details: Initialize Alembic in project, configure alembic.ini with database URL, set up env.py to import models, configure migration script template, ensure proper connection to PostgreSQL container
subtasks.testStrategy: Test Alembic can connect to database and generate migration scripts

subtasks.title: Create Initial Database Migration
subtasks.description: Generate and apply first migration script to create all tables
subtasks.details: Generate initial migration script using Alembic autogenerate, review migration script for accuracy, apply migration to create all tables in PostgreSQL, verify all tables, indexes, and constraints are created correctly
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all tables exist in database with correct schema and can perform basic CRUD operations

tasks.title: Implement Basic Authentication System
tasks.description: Create user registration, login, and session management functionality
tasks.details: Implement JWT-based authentication with FastAPI security utilities, create user registration and login endpoints, add password hashing with bcrypt, implement session management and protected route decorators.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration flow, login/logout functionality, JWT token validation, and protected endpoint access control

tasks.title: Develop LLM Integration for Receipt Processing
tasks.description: Create AI processing module using Gemini-2.5-flash with OpenAI-compatible fallback for receipt parsing
tasks.details: Implement LLM client with configurable endpoints (Gemini-2.5-flash default, OpenAI-compatible alternative), create receipt parsing prompts that extract store name, date, total amount, and line items with categories, implement error handling and retry logic, add response validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with various receipt formats, validate JSON output structure, measure parsing accuracy against known receipts, test failover between LLM providers

tasks.title: Build Receipt Upload and Image Processing Pipeline
tasks.description: Create receipt image upload functionality with preprocessing and storage
tasks.details: Implement FastAPI file upload endpoints supporting JPEG, PNG, and PDF formats (max 10MB), add image preprocessing for quality enhancement, create object storage system for receipt images, implement upload validation and error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test file upload with various formats and sizes, validate image preprocessing quality, test storage and retrieval of images, verify upload limits and error handling

tasks.title: Implement Core Receipt Processing Workflow
tasks.description: Create end-to-end receipt processing from upload to data extraction and storage
tasks.details: Build processing pipeline that takes uploaded images, calls LLM for data extraction, validates extracted data against receipt totals, stores structured data in database, handles processing errors gracefully, implements processing status tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test complete workflow from image upload to data storage, validate data extraction accuracy, test error handling for parsing failures, verify processing status updates

tasks.title: Develop Basic Frontend Receipt Upload Interface
tasks.description: Create mobile-friendly web interface for receipt upload and processing status
tasks.details: Build responsive React/Vue.js interface with camera capture and file upload capabilities, implement drag-and-drop functionality, add processing status indicators, create receipt preview and confirmation screens, ensure mobile-first responsive design.
tasks.testStrategy: Test upload interface on mobile and desktop devices, validate file handling and preview functionality, test processing status updates in real-time

tasks.title: Create Basic Analytics and Dashboard Backend
tasks.description: Implement API endpoints for spending analytics and data aggregation
tasks.details: Create FastAPI endpoints for monthly spending summaries, category-based breakdowns, receipt listing with pagination, individual receipt details, implement efficient database queries with proper indexing, add caching for frequently accessed analytics data.
tasks.testStrategy: Test analytics endpoints with sample data, validate query performance with large datasets, test pagination and filtering functionality, verify caching effectiveness

tasks.title: Build Analytics Dashboard Frontend
tasks.description: Create interactive dashboard for spending visualization and receipt management
tasks.details: Implement responsive dashboard with chart libraries (Chart.js/D3.js), create monthly spending overview charts, category breakdown visualizations, receipt listing with search and filter capabilities, individual receipt detail views, ensure mobile responsiveness.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard responsiveness across devices, validate chart rendering with various data sets, test filtering and search functionality, verify user interaction flows

tasks.title: Implement Data Export Functionality
tasks.description: Create Excel export feature for expense data with date range selection
tasks.details: Build export API endpoint using openpyxl or similar library, implement date range filtering, create Excel templates with proper formatting for receipts and line items, add download functionality with proper file naming and headers.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Excel export with various date ranges, validate file format and content accuracy, test download functionality across browsers, verify large dataset export performance

tasks.title: Implement Receipt Verification and Manual Override System
tasks.description: Create system for validating AI parsing accuracy and allowing manual corrections
tasks.details: Build validation logic comparing parsed line items total with receipt total, create manual editing interface for correcting parsing errors, implement approval workflow for processed receipts, add bulk editing capabilities for categories and line items.
tasks.testStrategy: Test validation logic with receipts containing various total discrepancies, validate manual editing interface functionality, test bulk operations performance, verify data integrity after manual corrections
